cases.input: 32-year-old female with 3-day history of runny nose, mild sore throat, and occasional dry cough. No fever. No shortness of breath. No medical history. Vitals normal.
22-year-old male twisted his right ankle playing basketball 2 hours ago. Mild swelling, can bear weight. No deformity. Denies numbness or tingling. No prior injuries.
65-year-old female requesting refill discussion for her metformin and lisinopril. Feeling well. Blood sugar well controlled per home monitoring. No new symptoms.
40-year-old male with itchy rash on forearms after gardening. No facial swelling, no breathing difficulty. Started 4 hours ago. No known allergies. Vitals normal.
